page.title: 10DAY IN LIFE OF-2 CONTINUED.
page.content: Andrew Wheildon continues his account thus: "Mother then has her lunch and does the housework. Heather gets back from school at 5 p.m.,I somewhat earlier.My father gets home about 5.30,and then tea is served.After tea without exception,I wash up and make everybody a cup of coffee.Everybody then relaxes,and later my sister and I go out to see some friends,and have a laugh playing cricket or some other pastime.Our prep is usually done as soon as we get home from school,or just after tea.During the evening dad helps mum with the horses and then,after a snack,I eventually go to bed.
